data.displayName: Residential Seniors Saver - New To AGL

fees.description:
Fee may be charged when reconnecting or reading your meter when you move into a property or change retailer. Includes GST. Fees may vary.
Additional fees and charges may apply. Please see the standing offer terms and conditions at agl.com.au
Fee may be charged when disconnecting or reading your meter when you move out of a property or change retailer. Includes GST. Fees may vary.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to card payments made at Australia Post outlets
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Visa debit cards.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Visa credit cards.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Mastercard credit cards.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Mastercard debit cards.

electricityContract.terms: Offer only available in areas where AGL operates. For further information about the terms and conditions applicable to this energy offer, please contact AGL on 131 245 or visit agl.com.au
electricityContract.variation: This plan also includes variable rates, retail fees and charges, which can change at any time with notice to you. If we vary your rates, we will give you at least 5 business days prior notice of the variation. Other charges may be varied with notice

incentives.eligibility: For new & moving AGL customers who stay with AGL at the same address for 90 days from start of the plan. Credit will appear on next bill after 90 days. Non-transferable. Accounts may be excluded from receiving more than one credit per fuel in 12 months

eligibility.information: Offer only available to customers with Seniors Card and an applicable network tariff. This offer applies to customers with an applicable network tariff. For solar feed-in tariff eligibility, or for further information about the terms and conditions applicable to this energy offer, please contact AGL on 131 245 or visit agl.com.au.

singleRate.description: For example storage water heaters, with the hours of application determined by your Distributor.

controlledLoad.displayName: Applicable to customers that have controlled load

greenPowerCharges.description: For $1 per week inc. GST we ensure energy equal to 20% of your consumption will be fed into the grid from Accredited GreenPower generators.
For 4.4c / kWh inc. GST we ensure energy equal to 100% of your consumption will be fed into the grid from Accredited GreenPower generators.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Your market contract is ongoing. From time to time, AGL reviews its offers and this offer will be reviewed with consideration to AGL’s generally available market offers
